title: Can you get victorious Elise anymore and if so how

replies.body:
Victorious skins are basically trophies for people who reached gold division in each season.

Season 1 had Jarvan, Season 2 had Janna, Season 3 Elise, and season 4 Morgana.

There is no other way to get these skins. Once they are given out, they are unavailable forever afterwards.
Ah thanks so I cannot get this skin even by mystery gift?

> [{quoted}](name=xI Judgement Ix,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UfX4rtRs,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-22T02:40:49.407+0000)
>
> Ah thanks so I cannot get this skin even by mystery gift?

Nope. Those skins are unavailable through mystery gift. They are 100% impossible to obtain after they were handed out at the end of their respective season.
Aziriously OP is correct, there's currently no way to obtain achievement skins for past years.

Have you guys/gals at Riot thought of perhaps allowing players that achieve Gold to choose which Victorious skin they gain rather then w/e is up for that year?
My thoughts are that we stay in keeping with achieving Gold Rank be the only way to gain a Victorious skin but giving the players their choice of which single Victorious skin to be rewarded with (current or previous).
Does this sound plausible?
It's a cool idea in theory - but is it fair to those who played in previous seasons and earned the rewards then?
Well in my opinion the only thing to lose if it was changed would be that people knew that you got it from a specific season.

Thanks for the reply's all anyways I bought blood moon Elise using some birthday money and I agree that it would be good if you could select which victorious skin you got. Also isn't there going to be another victorious skin in season 5?

Happy belated birthday! ^-^ 

Yup! There's one every year! :]
Thanks it is today :) around when this year will the victorious skin be? And I wonder who it will be XD

Oh, well then, looks like I'm not late after all! 

The Victorious skin is generally announced towards the end of the season! Some of the criteria includes being an impactful champion throughout the 2015 season - so keep an eye out on who's dominating the Rift this season. :D
So,no Victorious {{champion:6}} then?
so that means we should expect victorious zed/leesin right?

> [{quoted}](name=Thryale,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UfX4rtRs,comment-id=000100000000000000020000000000000002,timestamp=2015-02-24T18:46:20.761+0000)
>
> so that means we should expect victorious zed/leesin right?

Pretty much impossible to tell right now.  At the beginning of season 4 Shyvana and Renekton were top tier, towards the end it was Ryze, Rumble, and Kassadin.  I doubt anyone has a clear idea of what champions will be meta in 5+ months.

well, shy got a championship skin, and I think that championship skins have similar (not exact tho) criteria as victorious skins.

but yeah, my comment was mostly in jest due to all the ppl complaining about zed/lee and how they are also very popular to play atm as well.
It's still a bit early in the season to make a call. :]

Hmm well there is already Jarvan IV, Janna, Elise And Morgana so they wont get another which leaves more than a hundred other champions XD. I can't imagine what some champions would look like victorious for example victorious fiddlesticks. What is the victorious theme defined as?
Its usually blueish, silver and gold also they all have a head piece
Cool thanks for the information and Jarvan and Gnar would be cool as their synergy is good especially if you can get some enemies and mega gnar together in jarvans ult :D

Victorious Gnar?

Because we already have Victorious Jarvan...

> [{quoted}](name=Sampai Jester,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UfX4rtRs,comment-id=00010000000000000002,timestamp=2015-02-24T17:57:01.022+0000)
>
> Thanks for the reply's all anyways I bought blood moon Elise using some birthday money and I agree that it would be good if you could select which victorious skin you got. Also isn't there going to be another victorious skin in season 5?

I think that's a great idea at a minimum.  If you get into gold you can pick your victorious skin.  I didn't play much back in Season 3 or before, but I am an Elise main and I am kinda sad that there is no way I can own all of her skins.  I wish there was a way for Riot to make this available some way, some how.

"YoungFishFillet (NA)
 - about 4 hours ago

Lol I actually got it through a mystery skin on my smurf. Bought elise (only champ on smurf) then mystery skinned myaelf until I got it. Took me two tries"

wtf. So at first, there was?? Then you removed the chance of it being through mystery gift?? I saw this comment. I can only guess that he's either lying, or it must've happened during early mystery gift's first release. Cause I don't think that would be recent.
No, you cannot. It was a Season 3 reward and that has long past
I main Elise and i think it would be cool if your reached mastery 7 with Elise then you can buy the victorious skin with RP

Then that makes the journey to Gold & above back then not worth anymore, and the skin looks as bland as the Championship skin. 

Also, did you not noticed this is a 2 year old thread...?
Lol I actually got it through a mystery skin on my smurf. Bought elise (only champ on smurf) then mystery skinned myaelf until I got it. Took me two tries
I don't think you can mystery gift yourself with Elise alone. She doesn't have enough skins
Through my main acoumt I could lol the best way to get the skins you want is by doing it this way
I believe you need to have at least 10 missing skins to do that.
